head.title: Weddings; Ellen B. Ball, Bruce Haimowitz

hedline.hl1: Weddings; Ellen B. Ball, Bruce Haimowitz

block.p: Ellen Beth Ball and Bruce Raymond Haimowitz, computer software engineers, are to be married today. Rabbi Emily Lipof is to officiate at Temple Ohabei Shalom in Brookline, Mass.

The bride works in Waltham, Mass., for the International Business Machines Corporation. She graduated from Rutgers University, from which she also received a master's degree in electrical engineering. She is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Morris Ball of Wellington, Fla.
Ellen Beth Ball and Bruce Raymond Haimowitz, computer software engineers, are to be married today. Rabbi Emily Lipof is to officiate at Temple Ohabei Shalom in Brookline, Mass.

The bride works in Waltham, Mass., for the International Business Machines Corporation. She graduated from Rutgers University, from which she also received a master's degree in electrical engineering. She is a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Morris Ball of Wellington, Fla.

The bridegroom works at the Open Software Foundation, a computer-industry consortium in Cambridge, Mass. He graduated from the State University at Albany, and received a master's degree in computer science from Syracuse University. He is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Howard Haimowitz of Rego Park, Queens.
